definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common
see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]
see 聖女果|圣女果[sheng4 nu:3 guo3]

sentences.english: The acids in tomato juice can degrade the drink’s other ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 番茄汁中的酸會削弱其他材料帶來的味覺。

sentences.english: Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您來點什麼湯？我們有番茄蛋花湯，酸辣湯。

sentences.english: The drop in temperature frosted the tomato plants.
sentences.chinese: 氣溫下降凍壞了番茄苗。

sentences.english: Dice tomatoes and shred basil leaves, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 番茄切粒，紫蘇葉切絲備用。

sentences.english: In Egypt, there have been reports of street protests over the cost of tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及也有報導過，因爲番茄價格而有人上街抗議。

sentences.english: Add tomato puree, salt and 1 cup water; bring to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 加入番茄醬，鹽與1杯水，煮至沸騰。

sentences.english: Add onion, pineapple into soup first, then add tomato and bacha.
sentences.chinese: 先於湯中加入洋蔥及菠蘿，再加入番茄及白霞。

sentences.english: Nobody but you likes tomato soup.
sentences.chinese: 除了你沒人喜愛番茄湯。

sentences.english: Parma ham, fresh mozzarella, arugula salad filling with tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 巴馬火腿，馬蘇裏拉，芝麻草和番茄醬。

sentences.english: ADD salt and tomato paste halfway through the cooking, or later.
sentences.chinese: 在烹飪過程加適量的鹽或番茄醬或者稍後加。

sentences.english: In this paper, the binocular stereovision is applied to orientating red tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 運用雙目立體視覺技術對紅色番茄進行定位。

sentences.english: White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴紅椒，綠椒和黃椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: Penne Pasta, Zucchini, Bacon, Tomato Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 意式筆尖面，節瓜，培根，番茄汁。

sentences.english: Slowly cooked beef with olive and tomatoes served with rice.
sentences.chinese: 慢煮牛肉，配祕製番茄沙司和青橄欖。
李派林，甜椒，番茄沙司，芥末。

sentences.english: These are the tomatoes from Jen 's garden.
sentences.chinese: 這些番茄來自任氏菜園。

definition: eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
